content.description: Climb up to a high 1st bolt, turn the bulge and climb the slightly overhanging wall above on large edges.
content.location: Located in the hidden alcove at the right side of the Test Site amphitheater. Climb the 4 rung rebar ladder to reach the alcove. Up and right from Bunsen Burner.

content.description: Climb the center of the slab to the right of the Simple Gully.  The face gets steeper and the holds get more positive after the 3rd bolt.
content.location: To the right of the Simple Gully

content.description: This is the gully at the head of the Test Site. Simple Gully can be used to access the top of the cliff. Beware of the exposed stemming moves at the top. There have been numerous close calls here.
content.location: Right side of the Test Site wall.

content.description: After clipping the 1st bolt of Trial & Error, climb up and right following the overhanging prow to its top.  Climb left to rejoin Trial & Error to clip the last bolt and finish on that route.
content.location: On the left (west) face of the hidden alcove high up on the right side of the Test Site. Climb the rebar ladder to access the alcove.

content.description: Follow the right facing flake. When the flake ends continue up the vertical face above.
content.location: Left side of the broad face on the left wall of the Test Site amphitheater.

content.description: This route begins eight feet right of Placebo and climbs diagonally up and right, following the Simple Gully. The moves are unique.

climbs.name: Intellitoys
climbs.fa: Ben Chapman, Pam Neal, & Louie Anderson (January 2010)

content.description: Intellitoys climbs a steep orange face over a two foot roof at 1/3 height. Begin on a cobbled face below a left facing corner. Climb the face left of the corner to a roof which is surmounted on positive incut holds leading to stellar pockets. Above the roof continue climbing the fun vertical pocketed face with amazing red and orange features. Intellitoys finishes with two bulges at the top to the anchors. Surprisingly steep for the grade.
content.location: "Intellitoys" is located on the right (east) wall of the Test Site, 20 feet right of "Imaginarium."

content.description: Climb up the shallow dihedral before moving up and right through a small bulge. Continue climbing on the lower angled face above and over another bulge near the top.
content.location: On the right wall of the Test Site amphitheater, right of the alcove. Begins in a short, shallow right-facing dihedral on the left margin of the wall.

content.description: Climb up the black face opposite the climb, Trial & Error, passing several smooth cobbles at the top.
content.location: On the face opposite Trial & Error, on the right face. In the hidden alcove at the back right side of the Test Site. Ascend the rebar ladder to access the narrow alcove.

content.description: Catalyst starts on Litmus Test and after clipping the 4th bolt move up and left passing two independent bolts before joining Placebo at its last bolt. A link-up of Litmus Test & Placebo.
content.location: Begin as for Litmus Test, eight feet right of Placebo.

content.description: Climb up the bottom block and continue climbing past its ledge. After clipping the 2nd bolt traverse right on the ledge and climb the steep arete before traversing back to clip the anchors on "Bunsen Burner."
content.location: located on the right side of the large orange buttress, just right of the gully that splits the face. Left of the rebar ladder.

content.description: Climb up the bottom block, passing 1 bolt, and continue climbing past the ledge formed by the top of the block. Continue up the face, following  the line of bolts up the center of the upper face.
content.location: located at the back of the Test Site amphitheater at the right side of the huge orange block, right of the chockstone filled gully (Simple Gully).
